contentfulSermon.title: Acts: Part 11 - BIG BREAK, little faith

fields.notesFormatted:
Acts 12

  1. The church suffers a great loss.

  2. The church prays.

  3. The church turns to God with little faith.

  4. God's work continues despite the current events.

Four Things to Remember in a Crisis

  1. In this life I will have trouble.

    John 16:32-33

  2. There is no power in prayer...

    1 Kings 18:20-38

    John 14:13

    ...but the one we pray to is all powerful.

    Tips on prayer:

    Adoration, Confession, Thanksgiving, Supplication

  3. It's not the amount: it's the object of our faith that matters.

    Matthew 17:21

    Romans 10:13

  4. Fix your eyes on eternal things.

    Colossians 3:1-4
